extendedInfo.description: Read the best of the weekâs news coverage on your Android smartphone or tablet with this handy app from the UK edition of The Week magazine, optimised especially for your device. The Week magazine is a unique and witty digest bringing together the best of British and international press. Created for busy people like you, The Week condenses the news to give you a balanced view of a wide range of topics from the last seven days. All the key stories are analysed, plus youâll get summaries of the best articles from around the world, global events at a glance, and an informed, succinct briefing on a major news topic. Youâll also get the lighter side, including a look at the âControversy of the Weekâ, the arts, sport, the weekâs most important âTalking Points, property, a bit of gossip â and more. The complete magazine is available to read with this app.But don't take our word for it: download the app and subscribe today to see why over 378,000 readers rely on The Week every week to tell them all they need to know about everything that matters. ***FEATURES*** - Enhanced design to suit your device- Intuitive navigation â tap straight to your favourite section- Download each new issue every Friday then read offline at your leisure- Quick to download â small file sizes wonât keep you waiting- Share articles with friends and family via email, Facebook and Twitter- Daily Briefing of the top 10 most important stories, every day (needs wifi/3G)- Night-reading mode for bedtime readers- Adjust the text size to your preference- hi res images ready for HD screens- The app is free to download â purchase single issues or subscriptions in app- Digital and print + digital subscribers have full access to each weekâs edition and all digital back issues - Subscribe directly with Dennis Publishing and your subscription will work across your Android, Kindle Fire and Apple devices â plus youâll get your first 6 issues free http://subscription.theweek.co.uk - Current print subscribers should contact the publisher to add digital access to their subscriptionThe app works on Android 4.0 and above.

reviews.title: Won\'t confirm my sub!
reviews.comment: I\'m a UK subscriber to the paper issue of The Week but when I enter my Subs password code in this app it tells me my sub has expired (it hasn\'t). So this app is of no use to me.
reviews.author: Michelle Matthews

reviews.title: Nice, but big big
reviews.comment: Good app. However, keeps causing my tablet to run out of space because it doesn\'t save downloads to SD and they\'re hefty files ... It also therefore keeps rating itself as memory runs right.
reviews.author: Edward Whishaw

reviews.title: Excellent but can\'t currently download
reviews.comment: When I try to buy this week\'s issue I get an error message. Love \'The Week\'  please fix ASAP.  T
reviews.author: Toby Freeman

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Works well- can download and read. Font size can be made a decent size. Can we have select text functionality please? I\'d like to be able to copy and paste.
reviews.author: David Conkey

reviews.title: Great summary.
reviews.comment: I only use this app for the 10 things I need to know, if you don\'t have much time on your hands it\'s a great way of keeping up to date!
reviews.author: Mark Roberts

reviews.title: Download Fails
reviews.comment: As with quite a number of other people I am unable to download issues. Very poor. New version still the same.
reviews.author: Mike Spence

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Sean Healy

reviews.comment: Easy and clear
reviews.author: Iain Garden

reviews.title: An excellent news magazine - BUT
reviews.comment: The app is very poor. Navigation particularly long winded and unintuitive. Poor searching.
reviews.author: Tony Etherington

reviews.title: Great magazine, truly awful app
reviews.comment: Signed up for a free trial through google play - \"unable to download file\". No further explanation.  Emailed on address provided to query and email returned as address does not exist. Complete waste of time. Why not check it works before making it available?
reviews.author: Anthony Power

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on my Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Strange - as other users report this app working on Nexus 7. Mine just crashes as soon as I load it up. Have un-installed and re-installed. Has never successfully got past registering my subscription before failing so totally useless.  Update - Tried the app on on HTC One V - fails in the same way, but, works fine on my son\'s Nexus 7  Further update - Factory reset on Nexus - download app - still the same problem
reviews.author: David Latham

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Best app of its type that I\'ve tried
reviews.author: Lee Boot

reviews.title: Informative
reviews.comment: A great roundup. with BBC. News online, The Week completes my News needs,
reviews.author: TINA AMBURY

reviews.comment: Perfect for my commute
reviews.author: Patrick Joyce

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t do without it.  First class.
reviews.author: Jonathan Barkway

reviews.title: TGITW
reviews.comment: Informative,  enjoyable and essential and on Android.
reviews.author: Tim Alexander

reviews.title: Great magazine, great app
reviews.comment: Really neat adaptation of the magazine, plus daily news updates. Only downside, it doesn\'t work on older Android devices...
reviews.author: Alan Carter

reviews.title: Great, but minor problem
reviews.comment: I have successfully downloaded previous editions; while away in Peru I could not download two week\'s editions, and they continue not to download now I am back in UK.  The current edition has, however just downloaded successfully!  The tablet keeps forgetting my subscription information, too. I wonder if there is a help forum somewhere?  Its well put together, but I just wish it was possible to see the crossword on the digital edition.
reviews.author: S Anderson

reviews.title: Cannot download
reviews.comment: Very poor user experiance! Error when downloading latest copy! No explanation. Tried un-installing and going through process again. Still not working. Shocking!!
reviews.author: Mike Pollard

reviews.title: Superb App, Really Well Done
reviews.comment: Great app, I assume those having issues haven\'t upgraded their subscription to include digital editions-user error! So easy to use and clear reading.
reviews.author: Helen Burdis
